description: This is a Flutter application main file that sets up the app's root widget, theme, and home page.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds the UI with AppBar and loading indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing the widget tree.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
